document.full_text: in a case that has galvanized a protest movement against the government's campaign against drug traffickers, the authorities arrested a man believed to have ordered the murder of seven people.
document.title: the americas: mexico: man arrested in murder tied to drug cartel
lines_and_colors: in a case that has galvanized a protest movement against the government's campaign against drug traffickers, the authorities arrested a man believed to have ordered the murder of seven people.
